attributes.action: Examine employment practices in the public sector and give better guidelines on suspension procedures
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Love 'em or lose 'em - public sector workers are leaving in droves - chaotic management, poorly supervised infrastructure ... and so on ... professional people with families to provide for will not withstand these amateurish employment practices - I could cite examples, but you probably wouldn't submit my petition
